synopsis.text: Plan et Earth has become a hotbed of intergalactic romance for Rito Yuuki, but managing his growing harem is no easy feat. As he grapples with his feelings for his longtime crush Haruna, the Devilukean Princess Momo's Harem Plan hangs in the balance. Amidst this romantic turmoil, the enigmatic assassin Golden Darkness, also known as Yami, finds herself entangled in her own family drama with her younger sister Mea and their newly discovered mother Tearju. But as the Yuuki household adjusts to their new normal, a sinister force lurks in the shadows, threatening to disrupt their fragile peace. With the fate of the world hanging in the balance, can the light of love triumph over the looming darkness? Only time will tell in this thrilling installment of the beloved anime series.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
